config.mmic.title: MMIC
config.mmic.gridColor.tip: Changes the color of the togglable grids (thirds, halves etc.)
config.mmic.gammaStep.tip: Changes by how much % the brigthness will change when using the brightness buttons
config.mmic.miniF3.tip: Replaces the default Debug HUD (F3 menu) with a new, smaller one which displays only the most important information.
config.mmic.pickupDisplayTime.tip: Time (in seconds) before item pickup notifications disappear
config.mmic.lagType.tip:
Changes the type of lag caused by the lag switch
BLOCK causes all packets sent by the client to be completely ignored
CLOG blocks all packets and sends them all at once when the lag switch is disabled
LOSSY_BLOCK causes a randomly chosen 25% of all packets to be blocked
LOSSY_CLOG causes a randomly chosen 25% of all packets to be blocked and sent when lag is toggled off
